Women and Lung Cancer Research and Preventive Services Act of 2023
A bill to require a review of women and lung cancer, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary:
Women and Lung Cancer Research and Preventive Services Act of 2023
This bill requires the Department of Health and Human Services to conduct an interagency review of the status of women and lung cancer. The review must
report on the status of existing research and current knowledge gaps; identify new opportunities for collaborative research to determine the causes of lung cancer and advance prevention, screening, diagnosis, and treatment; and provide recommendations for a national cancer screening strategy and public education campaign.
